name: Lucky Nights at Louie's
description:
Put yourself out there at your local bar's speed dating mixer event, "Lucky Nights at Louie's"! Get to know quirky , untempting characters and decide on who you'll settle for!

Credits:

Kent Anderson-Brettell: Writing (Mary)

Liana Valdez: Writing (Dylan)

Eric Vander Horst: Writing (Reuben)
